sentences.en: Celluloid resulted from efforts to produce a synthetic horn.
sentences.cn: 制造合成角质的层试,导致了赛璐珞的产生.

sentences.en: Chaplin’s comic genius is preserved on celluloid.
sentences.cn: 卓别林的喜剧天才在电影里被保存了下来。

sentences.en: Chopsticks made of celluloid buckle easily in hot water.
sentences.cn: 赛璐璐筷子在热水中容易弯曲.

sentences.en: Each thought and gesture are caught in celluloid.
sentences.cn: 每个动作都是处于思想和胶卷.

sentences.en: Her marvellous acting talent is preserved on celluloid.
sentences.cn: 她非凡的表演才能在电影里被保存下来.

sentences.en: Jenny was playing with her celluloid ducks and ships.
sentences.cn: 珍妮在玩弄用赛璐珞做成的鸭和船.

sentences.en: King's works seem to lack something on celluloid.
sentences.cn: 金的作品搬上银幕后似乎缺点什么。

sentences.en: Minghella himself never thought his source material too arcane for Celluloid treatment.
sentences.cn: 明格拉本人却从未想过原作过于隐晦而不易拍摄.
我们厂制造赛璐路制品.

sentences.en: The Leica camera and the celluloid film cooperated to produce the best possible results.
sentences.cn: 徕卡相机和胶片产生了最佳的效果.

sentences.en: The wood is perfectly clean, delicate jade, known as celluloid.
sentences.cn: 其木质洁白无瑕, 细腻如玉, 被誉为假象牙.
戏剧作品转换成了电影.

sentences.en: There are no heroes but in celluloid ( Charles Langbridge Morgan )
sentences.cn: 除电影里再无英雄 ( 查尔斯兰布里奇摩根 )

sentences.en: These articles are made of celluloid.
sentences.cn: 这些东西是赛璐珞制的.

sentences.en: This property has led to a revival of interest in celluloid.
sentences.cn: 赛璐珞的这一特性,使它再度受到了注意.

trans.tran_cn: 赛璐珞，电影胶片，假象牙
